display_name: Frequency of leg twitch/kick, number of episodes per week
description: How often do your legs twitch or kick when you sleep?
calculation: If par_0110=0 then par_0120=par_0100*7, If par_0110=1 then par_0120=par_0100,    If par_0110=2 then par_0120=par_0100/4, If par_0110=3 then par_0120=par_0100/52
